meanings.definition: The quality or state of being tangible.
meanings.sent1: The tangiblenesses of the toy made it easy for the child to understand.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated the tangiblenesses of the sculpture, feeling the smooth surface with her hands.
meanings.sent3: The tangiblenesses of the ghost costume made everyone laugh at the Halloween party.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was as clear and real as the tangiblenesses of the morning sun.
meanings.sent5: The tangiblenesses of the freshly baked bread filled the kitchen with a warm, inviting aroma.

meanings.definition: The tangible aspects or qualities of something.
meanings.sent1: In science class, they discussed the tangiblenesses of different materials.
meanings.sent2: The artist focused on capturing the tangiblenesses of nature in her paintings.
meanings.sent3: The tangiblenesses of the cake were so tempting that he couldn't resist taking a bite.
meanings.sent4: Her words carried the tangiblenesses of truth, resonating with everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The tangiblenesses of the old book transported her back to a different era.
